name: Arcanum (Defalt_h3l)
description:
Arcanum

Arcanum is a singleplayer adventure Game in which you need to survive in a hedge maze.

Try to collect all 6 special tarot cards before the roaming devil finds you. 

Be careful! Each time you collect a card the devil will get more and more aware of your position!

Can you escape the maze?

This game was created as a school project for the htk Game Jam - "Ice Edition 2021", in 5 days of development.

Credits:

Programming - David Ruf

3D Assets - Sebastian Hillenbrand/Robin Grunder/Ricardo Rodrigues

Animation & Rigging - Ricardo Rodrigues

UI Design - Silke Lamczak

Artwork - Silke Lamczak

Concept Design - Robin Grunder

Music & Sounds - Sebastian Hillenbrand

Special Thanks to David Ruf & help from outside
